driver = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="be329cdd-f94c-4625-983b-5389b7047f3f")>

    @allure.epic("Login Flow")
    @allure.title("Test valid login with fallback OCR and AI suggestions")
    def test_login_success(driver):
        try:
            # Find the phone number input field with multiple locator strategies
            phone_input = smart_find_element(
                driver,
                name="phone_number_input",
                xpath=locators["phone_number_input"],
                fallback_text="Phone"
            )
    
            # Verify element was found
            assert phone_input is not None, "‚ùå Phone number input not found"
    
            # Clear the field first in case there's existing text
            phone_input.clear()
    
            # Enter the phone number with verification
            phone_number = "7660852538"
            phone_input.send_keys(phone_number)
    
            # Verify the text was entered correctly
            entered_text = phone_input.text
            assert entered_text == phone_number, f"‚ùå Phone number not entered correctly. Expected: {phone_number}, Got: {entered_text}"
    
            # print("‚úÖ Phone number entered successfully")
    
        # except Exception as e:

            next_button = smart_find_element(
                driver,
                name="next_button_login",
                xpath=locators["next_button_login"],
                fallback_text="Next"
            )
            assert next_button is not None, "‚ùå Next button not found"
            next_button.click()
    
            # STEP 3: Wait for dashboard or success screen
            dashboard = smart_find_element(
                driver,
                name="dashboard_title",
                xpath=locators["dashboard_title"],
                fallback_text="Dashboard"
            )
            assert dashboard is not None, "‚ùå Login likely failed: Dashboard not found"
    
            allure.attach("‚úÖ Login success", name="Test Result", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
    
        except Exception as e:
            screenshot_path = "screenshots/failed_login.png"
